column1: # Name: Can unmarried women sign a contract?

# Definition: The answer is “Yes” if full legal capacity is obtained upon the age of majority and there are no restrictions on unmarried women signing legally binding contracts;The answer is “No” if unmarried women have limited legal capacity to sign a legally binding contract.
# Source: World Bank, Women Business and the Law
# Data from the No Ceilings project: http://noceilings.org
# For more about the data, please visit http://noceilings.org/data
